name: Jasmine: Hotwife For Life - Demo
description:
You are happily married to the beautiful Jasmine. You would like to turn her into a Hotwife.

 After ten years of wedded bliss, you have become interested in seeing her shared with other men. In other words, you'd like her to become a Hotwife. You will work to convince her to give it a try, and to fully enjoy the joyful and sexy world of The Hotwife Lifestyle.

You have the opportunity to introduce her to sex with other men, including threesomes, orgies, and even gangbangs. She is hesitant at first, and even shy. But, make the right choices, and she will indulge, and share her adventures with you.

A male protagonist, swinging wife story.

This is a Wife-Sharing, Stag/Vixen story. If you have moral objections to the genre, please pass on downloading this Visual Novel.

I am currently working on updating all of the artwork, especially for the main character, Jasmine. It will take some time, but the image above is quite different from the original, and vastly improved, I hope. This free, DEMO version is ready to play. The complete makeover should be completed soon.

Stan (12-28-2020)
